name: RAVE.WAV
description:
Made in less than 48 hours during the 2017 Global Game Jam - you are a wacky-armed-inflatable-tube-person working at a used car lot, and you have to bring in the crowds by doing the one thing you do best: DANCING!

Credits: 

Tim Hely: Lead programmer, Design & layout

Emma Daues: Design & layout, Assistant programmer, Sound effects/voices

Jordan Covert: Graphics

Vicky Hedgecock: Graphics

Kelly Meyer: Graphics

Laray McGee: Graphics

Jevion White: Graphics, Design, Music & sound, All-around Good Guy™

Naomi Hely: Design, Sound effects/voices
